title: WiiWare/VC MegaPack - over 300 Wii Wads - UNZIPPED
description:
This torrent is a repack of one that can be found here: http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/4474619/WiiWare_WiiVC_WiiChannel_MEGAPACK_OVER_300_Wii_WADs

This one has been unrar&#039;d so you can download only what you want, rather than being forced to download the whole damn thing.  Nothing has been changed otherwise.


---------------------------------------------------------------------------


All files are NTSC. File origins vary; some are native NTSC, some regionfree, some injected and some patched from PAL.

304 Items (302 WAD Games & 2 Wii Channels)

    Opera Internet Channel
    Homebrew Channel
